name: Rise and Fall (itch)
description:
When I rise

let me rise up joyful

like a bird

When I fall

let me fall without regret

like a leaf

From this poem I created a game when you the player must activate switches in order to move on to the next level.

Controls:

Use the arrow keys to move the player left, right, and up. You can also double jump by pressing the up button twice.
